title: Lost Boy
description: From Wall Street Journal and USA Today Bestselling Author M. Robinson comes this standalone contemporary romance full of feels and angst...In a world where I had no say, violence became my refuge, and nothing else mattered.Not even my own life.Until her.Skyler Bell.It all started the first time I heard that voice. Giving me hope for tomorrow. My first love was everything all at once.Consuming.Maddening.Forever.Mine. Except, I never imagined there were secrets that needed to be shared. Lies that needed to be confessed. Truths that needed to be told. Demons that needed to be buried. Once I realized the depth, the longing, the sadness and sorrow in her eyes mirrored mine, it was too late. Love didn't come to me as heartbreak, it came as everything I've ever wanted. Walking away wasn't an option, but it was the only choice I had.I finally found the price of love and it cost me...My soul.
author: M.  Robinson
